Summary: bright green star looking thing went across the sky
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Littleton

divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing in frond of my house and saw a green star like thing go across the sky, it was pulsating and was faster than a plane but slower than a shooting star, i thought it was like a flair but it went straight across the sky. i didnt know what to think it was i never that before, not too exciting but weird. i live in lakewood co i dnt know how far it was maybe 15 miles and it was to the north of my house.
